data.title: List of Country, Its Capital & Currency
data.meta_description: Country, Capital & Currency 2022 - Download the PDF with the list of countries and their capital and currency along with the continents they are located in. Also, get sample questions to prepare for competitive exams.
data.text:
Country, capital and currency is one of the most important topics in terms of Static GK for the various Government exams conducted in the country.

The General Awareness section is a part of almost all major Government exams and scoring marks in this section is the easiest since no calculations and solutions are required. But this is possible only if a candidate is completely prepared.

In this article, we bring to you the list of countries along with their capital and the currency. Candidates must learn this to their tips as it may prove to be beneficial for them. Also, a few Country, Capital and Currency – Sample Questions have been given further below.

Country, Capital & Currency PDF:-Download PDF Here

Also, for the reference of candidates, given below are a few links that may help you score more in the upcoming Government exams:

Free Mock Test Series with Solutions

Previous Year Government Exams Question Papers PDF with Solutions

Current Affairs

Daily News Analysis

Country, Capital and Currency – Sample Questions

To give a better understanding of the type of questions that may be asked with respect to the country, capital and currency topic, given below are a few sample questions for your reference.

Q 1. Which of the given combinations of country and currency are incorrect?

Belgium – Euro

Portugal – Dollar

Spain – Euro

Chile – Peso

Bangladesh – Taka

Answer: (2) Portugal – Dollar

Q 2. What is the capital of Australia?

Vienna

Brussels

Canberra

Minsk

Cairo

Answer: (3) Canberra

Q 3. Euro is not the currency of which of the following countries?

Netherlands

Portugal

Spain

Sweden

Vatican City

Answer: (4) Sweden

Q 4. Thimpu is the capital of which country?

Bhutan

Nepal

Cuba

Fiji

Egypt

Answer: (1) Bhutan

Q 5. What is the currency of Switzerland?

Euro

Pound

Swiss Dollar

Swiss Franc

Swiss Rupee

Answer: (4) Swiss Franc

The above-mentioned questions are for the assistance of candidates and to have a better idea of the questions asked in the General Awareness section, candidates can check the Free Online Government Exam quiz at the linked article.

Country, Capital & Currency PDF:-Download PDF Here

For any further assistance, candidates can refer to BYJU’S and get the list of preparation books, study material and exam information.
